title: Georgia Secretary of State Investigates Voting Groups But Denies Widespread Fraud
sub_head: Raffensperger says machine recount on track to be completed Wednesday
body:
Georgia Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger said the state’s machine recount of the presidential race is on schedule to be completed by Wednesday, and pushed back against accusations of widespread fraud in the state’s Nov. 3 election results.
Mr. Raffensperger also said officials have opened an investigation into third-party groups that he said were trying to register people in other states to vote in Georgia ahead of the Jan. 5 Senate runoffs that will determine control of the U.S. Senate.
Gov....
